column2: Bab: My name is Griet Seekoei.
column3: Bab: My naam is Griet Seekoei.

column2: OS (Hendrik): You must actually in your …
column3: OS (Hendrik): Jy moet nou eintlik op jou…

column2: Bab: In my language?
column3: Bab: Op my taal?

column2: OS (Hendrik): No young-one (term of endearment) first wait.
column3: OS (Hendrik): Nee jong wag jy eers.

column2: Bab: In my language?
column3: Bab: Op my taal?

column2: OS (Hendrik): Yes.
column3: OS (Hendrik): Ja.

column2: Bab: Griet Seekoei yes.
column3: Bab: Griet Seekoei ja.

column2: Bab: This is Griet Seekoei, who speaks here.
column3: Bab: Griet Seekoei ke a he |xoa ng ki a.
column4:
N|uu 
Levi transcribed and translated. Bonny updated. Alena updated.

column2: OS (Tony): And your name?
column3: OS (Tony): En jou naam?

column2: Antjie: My name is Anna Kassie. My small-name (nick name) is Antjie.
column3: Antjie: Ng ka |î ke ng Anna Kassie. Ng a |î ⊙ȗndi ⇟ ’î, na ng Antjie.
column4:
N|uu 
Levi transcribed and translated. Bonny updated: ⊙ȗndi replaces pondi.

column2: Bab: He speaks now, here.
column3: Bab: Ha nou ⇟xoa ng ki a.
column4:
N|uu 
Levi transcribed and translated. Bonny updated. Alena updated.

column2: Antjie: That is the reason I spoke to him. Don’t you see him sit, and look at me? This is why I spoke a little so that they can understand me.
column3: Antjie: Kea gai ke mos na mos ⇟xoa ng ki a ha. G|a ||u si n|îî n||ng !u a soo, a ha ⇟aqe ng? Kea gai ke ng ⇟xoa ⇟ng ku cuu n||a.
column4: Levi transcribed and translated. Bonny updated. Alena updated.

column2: Bab: Don’t laugh Antjie.
column3: Bab: Moenie lag nie Antjie.

column2: OS (Hendrik): Now my name is again….
column3: OS (Hendrik): Ti |lens….tsens ge ||Khawa.
column4: Khoekhoegowak transcribed and translated by Niklaas Fredericks

column2: Bab: You wait first, you wait first.
column3: Bab: Wag jy eers, wag jy eers.

column2: Antjie: Me? I said now that my big-name is Anna Kassie and my small-name is Antjie.
column3: Antjie: My? Ek het nou gesȇ my grootnaam is Anna Kassie en my kleinnaam is Antjie.

column2: OS (Tony): Antjie.
column3: OS (Tony): Antjie.

column2: Antjie: Antjie Kassie.
column3: Antjie: Antjie Kassie.

column2: Bab: Yes, and my small-name is Babatjies.
column3: Bab: Ja, en my klein nametjie is Babatjies.
column4: Babatjies in Afrikaans means little baby

column2: OS (Tony): Babatjies.
column3: OS (Tony): Babatjies.

column2: Bab: Babatjies.
column3: Bab: Babatjies.

column2: Antjie: Babatjies.
column3: Antjie: Babatjies.
